install.name: mfSlideBar
install.author: Marcofolio.net
install.description: mfSlideBar allows you to add a nice sliding sidebar to your Joomla! website. Read the README.html and don't forget to publish this module!

param.name: loadmodule
param.label: Load module position
param.description: Set the module position to load (left, right, user1 etc.). NEVER use the same position as the position from this module.

param.name: pos
param.label: Position
param.description: On which side should the sidebar be positioned?

param.name: toppos
param.label: Margin from top
param.description: Set how many px the sidebar should be loaded from the top.

param.name: theme
param.label: Load theme
param.description: Select which theme to load (Defaults are dark, light and simple). Read the description how to use.

param.name: concolor
param.label: Color of the box
param.description: Set the color of the box in HEX value.

param.name: conwidth
param.label: Width of the box
param.description: Set the width of the box in pixel value.

param.name: conheight
param.label: Height of the box
param.description: Set the height of the box in pixel value.

param.name: conpadding
param.label: Padding of the text
param.description: Set the padding of the text in pixel value.

param.name: imgwidth
param.label: Width of the image
param.description: Set the width of the image in pixel value.

param.name: imgheight
param.label: Height of the image
param.description: Set the height of the image in pixel value.

param.name: imgalt
param.label: ALT of the image
param.description: Set the ALT attribute of the image
